meanings.definition: The way in which something is designed or arranged.
meanings.sent1: Her room's styling was modern and sleek.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer focused on the styling of the living room.
meanings.sent3: The styling of the cupcakes made them look like tiny works of art.
meanings.sent4: The styling of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The styling of her hair was so unique that everyone admired it.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a particular shape or form to something.
meanings.sent1: He used his creative styling to shape the clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: The stylist's expert styling of the dress made it look stunning.
meanings.sent3: The styling of the sandcastle was so intricate that it looked like a miniature palace.
meanings.sent4: Her styling of the origami paper created a delicate swan.
meanings.sent5: The styling of the clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a particular appearance or image.
meanings.sent1: The magazine cover's styling captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The stylist's job involves the styling of models for photoshoots.
meanings.sent3: The styling of the actor's costume made him look like a pirate.
meanings.sent4: Her styling of the room gave it a cozy and inviting feel.
meanings.sent5: The styling of the website made it easy to navigate and visually appealing.
